If your looking for a thrill in video games, Dead BY Daylight! Its not only scary, it is exciteing, and you need stragety. Play as a killer and try to kill all the four survivors before they turn on all five generators, and escape. Or play as a survivor trying to get all the generators turned on before the killer hangs you so you can be sacrificed. Not only is this game realistic, you are able to level up your killer and survivor to! You can unlock them perks, items that help out when your in action.So remember if you are looking for a thrill in video games, this is the game for you!

As much as I didn't want to change my 2017 review where I was having a blast with the game, the game has gone down hill over the last year or 2 to the point I do not recommend it.

At first it was fun, the people behind it we fun but they have no competition now and the game is in shambles, console players are getting HUGE performance issues and no fix, balancing in this game feels non-existent, the community is for the most part rather toxic and so many small things that build up. 

A chat censor was added what feels like a few months ago that censors things from "kill" to "Meg". A character's name, they added a match making cool down after you DC, BRILLIANT, now you lose a bit of rank and have to wait 5 minutes (time that stacks up with more DCs) before going in again and ruining a match. But with the game in it's current buggy state, a lot of people are crashing and as a result, getting a DC penalty. I've been slammed with 15 minute DC penalties once after 1 day of trying to have fun with friends, then they took the cool down away as they knew their game was causing crashes but they brought it back while the game still crashes. 

While the game at it's core is fun, with the amount of bugs in the game that you may encounter, it can easily be ruined in seconds. With the lack of competition it feels like the devs don't care about putting effort into fixing the game because there is no other like it on the market right now that you can go to instead and they know this. While the skins they add are nice, the re-designs and quality of life updates help, the game looking like it is running on a PowerPoint on console and freezing up for a second when you get hit on PC are some of a handful of things that personally have just ruined it for me.

Seit 2016, dem Release von DBD, weint die Community regelmäßig über das vermeintlich schlechte Balance des Spiels.
Frustration, wenig Selbstreflexion auf eigene Fehler, die man in einer Jagd gemacht hat, toxisches Verhalten etc. pp. sorgen tatsächlich dafür, dass das Spiel irgendwann zu einer Pulserhöhung führt.

Das ist jedoch alles in allem logisch, da das Unikat DBD durch einen asymmetrischen Multiplayer eben die Voraussetzung dafür bietet, dass der Spaßfaktor eines Spiels von dem Skill der einzelnen Survivor, dem Verhalten sowie Skill des Killers, aber auch besonders von dem eigenen Habitus (dem eigenen Verhalten) abhängt.

Faustformel für ein ausgewogenes Spiel dieser Art muss sein, dass vier Survivor in etwa so gut sind wie ein Killer, bei exakt gleichem Skill. Dies wird man logischerweise aber nur in der Theorie erleben und das ist doch auch das Schöne.

Spiele variieren, die Stärken der verfügbaren Killer, sowie der Spieler dahinter variieren. Und wenn man nicht toxisch ist, dann macht ein Spiel auch häufig Spaß, wenn man als Killer keine vier Kills geholt hat oder als Survivor nicht entkommen ist.
Appell: Erkennt vielleicht auch mal den Skill eures Gegners an und versucht aus euren Fehlern zu lernen. Denn das Grundprinzip ist so, dass der Killer die Survivor zu Fehlern zwingen muss/sollte.

Zusammengefasst: Dead by Daylight ist ein wunderbares Spiel mit natürlich kleinen Fehlern (an die sich die Devs aber größtenteils begeben). Und man kann definitiv eine tolle Formkurve des Spiels erkennen, denn die Devs haben es geschafft das Spiel von den Begebenheiten sehr balanced zu gestalten, sowie tolle Maps, Killer, Perks etc. in das Spiel zu integrieren. Viva la DBD!

Antes entraba. Jugaba de survivor. Quedaba primero, escapaba, descolgaba, loopeaba algo, me divertia. Gente se acercaba a mi perfil a decir cosas alentadoras. Saben? No se cuando cambio todo. Pero desde ya hace algo de tiempo. Solo entro para encontrarme (rango rojo) con killers campeando, jugando sucio y en el peor de los casos usando programas externos. Y cuando juego de killer hay partidas donde todos mueren facil o pasa que JUSTO cuando me acerco a alguien bajan los fps o justo cuando voy a golpear el survivor hace un movimiento extraño. Intentare explicar. Cuando pasa el tiempo y un juego no refresca sus reglas, contenido o manera de jugar, pues pasa que el humano astuto se adapta y tiende a romper las reglas porque ya sabe hasta donde estan los limites. Entonces, almenos en rangos rojos la vida en dbd para un jugador casual solo mode es insoportable porque o los compañeros de turno mueren rapido o a uno lo insultan hasta cansar porque si tiene la habilidad de sobrevivir al killer. Y si buscas grupos o algo, al final es gente interesada que se incomoda si no vas a su ritmo. Miren, si yo pudiera evitar haber invertido tanto dinero en el juego. No lo dudaria y haria algo mejor con mi salud mental. Porque de ser una experiencia divertida, de la nada se convirtieron en dias de agotamiento mental, aburrimiento, monotonia. Para colmo es imposible si quiera hacerte el buena gente siendo killer. Mi consejo seria, evita comprarte o gastar dinero en esto. Al final te arrepientes y no tiene nada que ver el ser bueno o malo, si lo consigues de manera gratuita o que alguien te lo compre, pues dale, asi no sentiras decepcion o que fuiste muy tonto. Yo lamentablemente inverti tanto que tiene que ser mi juego main . . . y entro solo para frustrarme, como puede ser que mi entretenimiento sea lo que cause una devacle en mi salud mental, increible! Bueno, si puedes evitalo, ojala te topes con esto. Y ojala algun dia pase de mi limite y pueda desinstalar para siempre este juego. Porque lo juro, NO VALE LA PENA! Mejorar para que te caguen  todo el esfuerzo, sin sentido total.

전반적으로 재밌는 게임입니다. 추천합니다.!

This game is really fun.  Unfortunately it's full of bugs and lacks content.  It feels like an early access game.  I'd say check back when it's stable, but the game has been officially released for a while now and half off on steam.  Who knows how much more work the devs will put into fixing it.  

There are no dedicated servers.  The Killer always hosts, and he can mess with his internet to make you lag or disconnect himself, wait for the survivors to DC, then get back in and get points.  Half of your games will have a disconnect.  It takes about 4 tries to get a game going if you play with friends.  

Also- your save is stored locally.  Sometimes the game bugs out and you lose everything.  This is real.


Edit: Hey guess what, there's a hard reset on rank every single month.  So for about two weeks you're playing against people way better than you, or stomping noobs.  Regardless of your skill level, this is stupid.

Неплохая концепция в связке с отвратительным геймплеем, вызывающим лишь чувства скуки и полного негодования по причине отсутствия баланса между выжившими и маньяком. Приплюсуем ко всему этому попытку создателей сделать вариативность, которая, по законам зарождающегося жанра, должна была быть умела вплетена в основную конву игру, но волей случая, так и осталась на стадии идеи, но никак не на реализации!
      Итог - очень посредственный и сырой продукт, однако может заинтересовать только из-за исключительности в своем жанре!

[b] Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4x1) survival-horror Game where one player takes on the role of the Killer, and 4 other players as Survivors which are trying to escape the Killer by turning on 5 generators and (need) 1 exit gate. The Killer tries to catch and kill them. 

While Survivor play in third-person the killer plays in first person.  [/b]

[b][u] Fun factor  [/u] [/b]

I have been playing Dead by Daylight since a while now, been playing other Survival-horror games like Friday the 13th, Propnight & Home Sweet Home:Survive. But Dead by Daylight will be forever the game that reminds in my heart. If we just ignore the fact of the unbalanced MMR system you can actually have fun in Dead by Daylight. It is not a beginner friendly game and even people that come back to DbD will find a hard time playing the game but the more frequently you play it the better DbD turns out to be.

[b] Survivor [/b]

Playing alone as one survivor and 3 other random survivors is possible but very hard and not really that much fun. 
[i] I really recommend here to play ATLEAST with one premade.  [/i] Playing with one more person than yourself improves the fun factor by a lot. A full "survive with your friends" ( 4 people ) group is the best at this point. But as I said, you can play the game alone and have fun or with just one more friend :)
Everything can be fun. ♥
But as someone who is new or came back to the game, play with atleast one more friend, it will not frustrate you by a lot. You can atleast count on eachother!!

[b] Killer [/b]

Playing as a Killer can be very hard and frustrating especially when you get experienced survivors and you dont have any good perks in your build. But I can highly recommend Killer!! Especially when you are new you should maybe play the Killer for one round and after Survivor just to figure out how Killer works but even if you just play Killer, it is completely fun and makes a ton of fun! Killers have a shorter matching time than survivors because they are more full survivor lobbys than actually killer. So you can faster come to play the game. I really love playing killer when I am all by myself and dont know what to do. Trying to outplay the survivors and try to control the game is actually hard but it makes so much fun! The more perks you have the better it is! Different perk builds can change your Killer experience by a lot! Try it out~ ♥

[b][u] Control & Gaming [/u] [/b]

As I mentioned the survivors play in third-person view and the Killer in first-person. Each Killer and Survivor can carry 4 Perks and 1 Offering with them. The Perks can have big impact on your gameplay and your surroundings. Some survivor perks are working on others, generators, totems, enviroment and Killer, depending on which one you have with you. Killer Perks can also work on survivors, generators, exit gates, repairing/healing speed, enviroment and yourself. 
Bringing Offerings into a round can bring you more Bloodpoints, higher chance for map, enviroment change, starting with other survivors together/for away from the killer, and much more other things. 
While Survivor can Carry Items with them (Keys, Flashlight, Flashbangs, Maps, Toolboxes, Medkits) one at a time with 2 Add-Ons (which can "upgrade"/"buff" your current items) the Killer has their Weapon with their Ability instead of Items. But they can also improve their Weapon/Ability with Add-Ons. 
Survivor can not kill the Killer, they can only run, blind(with flashlights, flashbangs, persk,etc.), loop, stun(pallets, perks, etc.) or take protections hits for other survivor to go against the Killer. 
The Killer can actually hit the Survivors with their weapon and interact with them with their Ability. They can short hit and long hit survivor with their weapon. Each Killer has their own Ability, check them out by yourself and try out which one you like more~♥
While Survivor are repairing generator they get quick time events where they have to hit skill checks by clicking at the right second the space bar. When they are being picked up by the Killer they have to wiggle (old: with A and D) by succesfully hit over and over again the skill checks. When Survivor get in second stage on the Hook they receive skill checks which they ALSO have to hit to not instantly die by the arms of the Entitus.

[b][u] Graphics [/u] [/b]

One thing that we have to mention at the beginning... They are updating visuals over and over again when they become old. Behaviour is ALWAYS improving and never failed on the Graphics, in my opinion. They are respectable for the game Dead by Daylight is. Even the Skins that they bring out are outstanding. 
You can lower your graphics which makes the game brighter most part. But even with low Graphics it doenst look the worst. Of course its the most beautiful when you play on the highest Graphics but if your computer cant come up to that point, you are still not missing out the beautiful game. 
If you are colourblind you can actually change the game settings to how you like it to be/how its moe comfortable for you!

[b][u] Sound [/u] [/b]

Overall the Music is dramatic and fits the atmosphere. The sound effects are leaning on realistic sounds. Some Killers & Skins have their own sounds which makes them unique and wonderful. Survivors are mostly heard screaming and crying. I never had a moment where I thought that is is REALLY Nasty, of course some weird slimy things in the enviroment actually sound slimy and if your watched "Stranger Things" the Demogorgon portals sound 100% the same as in the series. But for the aspect that it is a Survival Horror game where you have to escape several Killers with their unique Ability I think its pretty good in the sounds for each Killer. 

[b][u] Replayability [/u] [/b]

YES!! Its not a game where you play it once and there is nothing to do anymore. It is a game where you played Matches, you try to win over and over again. You try to level your Characters, maybe farm some comsetics and Perks. Maybe you wanna prestige all your Survivors and Killers? You can do all that. It takes a long time to come to a point where you have nothing to do. Even if you say "Lets get the highest rank!!!" Every 13th of the month we actually have a rank reset in Dead by Daylight, The higher your ranked the higher your Bloodpoint reward is. Survivor and Killer ranked are seperated! So you can get max. 2 million Bloodpoints.  You can also play with 5 friends together via "Kill your friends". You dont earn bloodpoints there but you actually can try out Perks and just have fun with friends :D
There is no End in Dead by Daylight. They bring out every 3 to 4 months a new Killer/Survivor out. So then you have AGAIN something to try out, to level and to just figure out.

[b][u] Support & Discord [/u] [/b]

I encountered a few errors in Dead by Daylight, thats okay, it is a big game and sometimes things happens. I wrote the Support and they always were there to help me. They 100% answer your inside 48 hours. But they replied to my Ticket inside of 12 hours. The support is YOUR FRIEND... they try to help you. Even if you find small bugs in the game or something weird happened. Please write them, they listen. Behaviour is doing such a amazing job and they really need to be praised more for that. By the way if you cant find the official Dead by Daylight Discord Server.. here it is:

https://discord.com/invite/deadbydaylight

Bonjour , je vais donner mon avis sur ce jeu :

Points positifs + :

- Bon graphisme 
- Le concept est très originals et amusants 
- Plusieurs personnages sont disponibles avec des compétences à améliorer ( Beaucoup plus de challenge ;) )
- Le nombre de " Ressource " que nous gagnons à chaque partie est résonnable pour ma part

Points négatifs - :
EDIT :

- Ces derniers temps, énormément de troll sont apparus pour camp et facecamp, ce qui détruit complètement le fun des joueurs.
- Pourquoi je perd des FPS quand je joue TUEUR ? Alors que survivant, tout va bien ?
- Des bugs soûlant qui peuvent vite détruite le fun.
- Communauté cancereuse, qui se sentent supérieur.

Je recommande ce jeu à 6/10
Clairement, je vais continuer, mais si vous êtes sensibles et que vous vous énervez facilement, je l'achetez pas.

Cordialement

Короче, все бы ничего, и интересно и завараживает, но одно но! Многочисленные БАГИ с вылетами из игры, в самый не ловкий момент, частые зависания в меню когда играешь с друзьями, КОРОЧЕ РЕБЯТА ИГРАЮ С 17 Года, и ЭТО ПЗД!!! КУЧА БАГОВ, 
с другом не поиграть, постоянно вылеты из лобби, поиск матча от 3 до 15 минут!!!!! ИГРА СКАТИЛАСЬ! In short, everything would be fine, and interesting and zavarazhivaet, but one but! Numerous BUGS with crashes from the game, at the most difficult moment, frequent freezes in the menu when playing with friends, in SHORT, I've been PLAYING SINCE 17 Years, and THIS is PZD!!! A LOT of BUGS,
not to play with a friend, constantly crashes from the lobby, search for a match from 3 to 15 minutes!!!!! THE GAME HAS ROLLED!

É um ótimo jogo, principalmente pra se jogar com amigos, porém, quando se joga multiplayer com desconhecidos ai que mora o stress, players killers campers, hackers que sabem aonde os sobreviventes estão mesmo sem perks, em menos de 2 meses jogando já foram mais de 50 reports por esses e outros motivos, infelizmente os proprios players estragam o jogo e a produtora não faz nada a respeito! Lamentável!

Waist of money

Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты с оружием идешь убивать хейтеров (которых у тебя нет на YouTube, но ты прекрасно воображаешь их в лице игроков)
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка
Dead by Daylight - это когда Dead by Daylight выходит раньше, чем "Friday the 13th: The Game"
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм
Dead by Daylight - это когда нет надоевшего всем раннего доступа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цену
No me abre

Love the game... when you can actually play it. I grabbed this during the summer sale and found myself "hooked" immediately. Talked a friend into purchasing it as well so we could play together.

That's where the problem lies. More than 50% (closer to 75%) of the games we attempt to play crash to the main menu or desktop when loading or finding a match.

If you plan on playing alone and only dealing with issues sometimes, grab the game and enjoy.

If you plan on playing with friends, consider something else! This isn't a new issue, it was being reported right after the games release and it appears nothing is being done to fix :/

One of the best multiplayer indie games ever. 
Its quick and easy to get started, hard to master, and a great 4-5 man party game. 
Have all your friends swap their download regions to Lan event (USA) to search for games within a smaller pool and you can easily end up in the same game and still get bloodpoints!

El juego esta muy decente pero no me gusta nada que cuando quiero jugar con mis amigos no me deja empezar pertida ni a mi ni a nadie pk dice que no tenemos conexión a internte. Alguien puede ayudarme a solucionar esto?

El juego muy divertido y con mucha tensión  y mas si es con amigos ( si es que puedes) por que el puto juego te manda a la puta cuando vas a jugar con amigos.

Recomiendo el juego? si y no depende, hay veces que si y otras que no depende del bug pero vamos... eso de que te eche 300 veces al que invita a los amigos es muy muyy molesto

Cuando lo arreglen cambiare de opinión y es una lástima por que el juego divierte muchísimo

Edit: Ya han arreglado el bug y rapido, por lo que ya es de nuevo jugable con amigos, ahora si que recomiendo el juego perfectamente
